tests.name: shouting
tests.test_code:
result = bob.hey 'WATCH OUT!'
expect(result).toEqual 'Whoa, chill out!'
tests.message: Expected 'I don't know.' to equal 'Whoa, chill out!'.

tests.name: asking a question
tests.test_code:
result = bob.hey 'Does this cryogenic chamber make me look fat?'
expect(result).toEqual 'Sure.'

tests.name: talking forcefully
tests.test_code:
result = bob.hey 'Let\'s go make out behind the gym!'
expect(result).toEqual 'Whatever.'

tests.name: using acronyms in regular speech
tests.test_code:
result = bob.hey 'It\'s OK if you don\'t want to go to the DMV.'
expect(result).toEqual 'Whatever.'

tests.name: forceful questions
tests.test_code:
result = bob.hey 'WHAT THE HELL WERE YOU THINKING?'
expect(result).toEqual 'Whoa, chill out!'
tests.message: Expected 'I don't know.' to equal 'Whoa, chill out!'.

tests.name: shouting numbers
tests.test_code:
result = bob.hey '1, 2, 3 GO!'
expect(result).toEqual 'Whoa, chill out!'
tests.message: Expected 'I don't know.' to equal 'Whoa, chill out!'.

tests.name: shouting with special characters
tests.test_code:
result = bob.hey 'ZOMG THE %^*@#$(*^ ZOMBIES ARE COMING!!11!!1!'
expect(result).toEqual 'Whoa, chill out!'
tests.message: Expected 'I don't know.' to equal 'Whoa, chill out!'.

tests.name: shouting with no exclamation mark
tests.test_code:
result = bob.hey 'I HATE YOU'
expect(result).toEqual 'Whoa, chill out!'
tests.message: Expected 'I don't know.' to equal 'Whoa, chill out!'.

tests.name: statement containing question mark
tests.test_code:
result = bob.hey 'Ending with a ? means a question.'
expect(result).toEqual 'Whatever.'

tests.name: prattling on
tests.test_code:
result = bob.hey 'Wait! Hang on.  Are you going to be OK?'
expect(result).toEqual 'Sure.'

tests.name: silence
tests.test_code:
result = bob.hey ''
expect(result).toEqual 'Fine. Be that way!'
tests.message: Expected 'I don't know.' to equal 'Fine. Be that way!'.

tests.name: prolonged silence
tests.test_code:
result = bob.hey '   '
expect(result).toEqual 'Fine. Be that way!'
tests.message: Expected 'I don't know.' to equal 'Fine. Be that way!'.
